name: TaskWorkshop
tag_list: pm, project, task, mac, linux, ios, iphone, ipad, android, windows, console, tool
overview:
TaskWorkshop is a free multiplatform project management service for startups and software developers that helps your team and clients work together more productively online.

It’s the first project management service based on open socket connections.

TaskWorkshop is available through the Web interface and desktop Notifier apps on Mac, Linux and Windows. It’s also available on mobile applications, console apps and command line tools.

TaskWorkshop doesn’t distract your team members. It makes them focus on their job and work more productively.

With TaskWorkshop your team collaboration reaches a new extremely fast level. All actions, comments or messages made on TaskWorkshop go to your teammembers within miliseconds, so they can react very fast.

We offer tools for fast everyday work, without useless features, which can only discourage or distract developers.

Clear interface, only necessary and useful features make it friendly, easy to use and time-saving.
